title: Savoy Cabbage And Turnips
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Savoy Cabbage And Turnips a try. One portion of this dish contains around 4g of protein, 4g of fat, and a total of 89 calories. For 65 cents per serving, this recipe covers 16% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. 2 people were impressed by this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 23 minutes. If you have savoy cabbage, butter, flat-leaf parsley, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 61%. This score is solid. Try Savoy Cabbage with Peppers, Marinated Savoy Cabbage, and Savoy Cabbage Gratin for similar recipes.
